This is a horrible copy!  The camera is out of focus in many places and jerks around, making only portions of the screen visible during key scenes, or cutting people's heads off.  Every time the screen goes black the picture gets grainy.  And worst of all, I only downloaded this because I saw the movie in a country where the subtitles weren't available in English, and I wanted to know what the Brazilian characters were saying.  You can't even read many of the subtitles because of camera problems!  Also, the color is terrible.  So forget about this shitty copy and wait for a DVD rip.
